p:
As a viral disease with a huge impact, constituting a global public health concern, YF remains poorly studied
14 , 33 , 53 . Some reports indicate that genetic variations of the disease may occur
27 . Other aspects that make yellow fever a challenging disease are its similarity with other hemorrhagic fevers (other Flaviviruses, leptospirosis, malaria), the sharing of the same endemics tropical areas, and the concomitance of diseases such as the ones caused by other arboviruses
3 , 41 , 56 . These aspects can delay the diagnosis and management of patients including adequate treatment and prevention measures.
